name: (NOT) Alone In The Dark
description:
Hello everyone, this is a game I made months ago made with an Udemy course so I decided to share it to you. There are some bugs in the game because it's not finished and the fog requires a lot of performance, you are warned ;)

Have fun!!

Controls: (some of them can be changed when launching the game)

-Move: ZQSD

-Reload: R

-Change weapons: 1 & 2

-Run: MAJ

-Fire: Left click or CTRL

Toggle Flashlight: F
